welcome.title: Welcome Aboard!
welcome.line1: Connect, engage, and explore. Let's make this channel extraordinary together!

noDataFound.message: Sorry, we can’t find the profile you are looking for.
noDataFound.messageLine2: Please check the name or try again.

congrats.finishedSettingUp: You have finished setting up your profile.
congrats.inviteMore: Now you can invite more people to your channel so that your channel reaches a bigger audience.

toastMessages.approveError: Something went wrong...! Please try again
toastMessages.approveSuccess: Successfully added a new member to channel
toastMessages.rejectError: Something went wrong...! Please try again
toastMessages.rejectSuccess: Request to join channel rejected successfully

documentTab.title: Documents
documentTab.reAuthorizeForAdmin: Your SharePoint credentials have expired. Please log in again to continue.
documentTab.reAuthorizeForOthersFirstHalf: There is a sync issue with SharePoint. Please contact
documentTab.reAuthorizeForOthersSecondHalf: or the support team to resolve this.
documentTab.activateFolderDescription: Connect your preferred SharePoint site to create, share, and collaborate on files and folders in this channel.
documentTab.enableIntegrationDescriptionLine1: Connect SharePoint to access and manage files directly from this platform.
documentTab.enableIntegrationDescriptionLine2: View, upload, and organize documents seamlessly within your workspace.
documentTab.deleteDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this? This action cannot be undone.

noDataFound.docListing: No documents found. Check back later or try another search.
noDataFound.site: No sites available. Check your permissions or refresh the list.
noDataFound.drive: No drives available. Check your permissions or refresh the list.
noDataFound.folder: No folders available. Check your permissions or refresh the list.
noDataFound.noConnection: No documents available in this channel.
noDataFound.accessDeniedSite: You don’t have permission to access this site. Please choose a different site or try again.
noDataFound.failure: Something went wrong, Please try again later.

listDirectories.failure: Failed to load. Please check your connection and try again

documentTab.noCommentAvailable: Be the first to leave a comment or ask a question.

memberTab.title: Members
memberTab.acceptFailure: Something went wrong. Please try again.
memberTab.declineFailure: Something went wrong. Please try again.
memberTab.noDataFound: Sorry, we can’t find the member you are looking for.
memberTab.noDataFoundLine2: Please check the spelling or try again.

addChannelMembers.failure: Failed to add members to the channel.

addChannelMembersStatus.failure: Failed to fetch status for jobId.

privacyRow.label: Privacy
privacyRow.privateDescription: Anyone can join automatically, and content is visible to all without joining.
privacyRow.publicDescription: Anyone in the organization can request to join the channel, and it's visible in the channel discovery.

restrictionRow.label: Restriction
restrictionRow.canCommentDescription: Anyone can post and comment, but announcements are restricted to admins.
restrictionRow.canAnnouncementDescription: Anyone can comment, but announcements are restricted to admins.

uploadControlRow.title: Who Can Upload Documents
uploadControlRow.anyoneDescription: Anyone in the channel can upload documents
uploadControlRow.channelAdminDescription: Only Channel Admins can upload documents

DocAccessLevelRow.title: Who Can Download Documents
DocAccessLevelRow.anyoneDescription: Anyone in the channel can download documents
DocAccessLevelRow.channelAdminDescription: Only Channel Admins can download documents

commentControlRow.title: Who Can Post Comments
commentControlRow.anyoneDescription: Anyone in the channel can post comments
commentControlRow.channelAdminDescription: Only Channel Admins can post comments
